name: Unnamed Twine Game About Robotic Bodies
name_original: Unnamed Twine Game About Robotic Bodies
description:
An android made to mingle with humans and serve them, wakes up in a world where humanity has gone extinct, and robots of all shapes and forms live peacefully. On a quest for self-identity, the android goes to meet some of the locals to hopefully learn more about itself in the process.

Thumbnail picture by mentatdgt from Pexels

Game made for the Non-Binary Game Jam 2020
